g.text: Dapp has established a session with Wallet for transaction signing using a previously obtained auth token
Submit for signing with cached auth token
[if wallet endpoint has an endpoint-specific URI]
Resubmit for signing with new auth token
the dapp identity (name, icon, website URI)
a persistent authentication token issued by the wallet to this dapp which is no longer valid
a persistent authentication token with the same privileges as
the wallet account public key for which this dapp is authorized
the transaction that the dapp wishes to have signed
with the private key corresponding to
, signed with the private key corresponding to
